name: 蒼葉
message: "A-Agh... Ah..."
...He's sucking the blood from my veins.
It feels... cold. Terribly cold.

name: 蓮
message: "Guh... Gruh..."
With a rumbling growl, he sinks his fangs into the muscle of my shoulder.
He's starving, desperate for the taste of my flesh.
I don't know where I am. Perhaps it's not a place at all.
How long have I been here... That, too, I've forgotten.
This has been my world―Ren's teeth and claws―ever since my Scrap attempt failed.
He's already consumed me utterly... more times than I can remember. Each time, I return from the darkness, and it begins again.

name: 蓮
message: "Grhhh... Guh..."

name: 蒼葉
message: "Ugh... Hnngh...!"
Ren laps up the blood gushing from my shoulder. He wriggles his tongue into the wound.
And then he takes his rigid lust and forces it deep inside me.

name: 蒼葉
message: "Eeek! A-Ahh... Ngh, ugh..."

name: 蓮
message: "Grrr... Ngh..."
My flesh cries out in pain, tearing.
Warm liquid trickles down my thighs and pools on the nonexistent floor.
Even though my thoughts have faded, the pain remains perfectly clear.
I just... want it to end.
Why...
Why did this happen...
Ren...
I've lost count of the times I've called his name. It never reaches. It never will.
Not in this broken world.
And still, I keep trying, even though my words have turned to blood.

name: 蓮
message: "Grrrrgh..."
